meanings.sent1: The ethylenic compound had a strong smell.
meanings.sent2: The plastic was made from an ethylenic material.
meanings.sent3: The ethylenic gas escaped from the container and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her ethylenic personality shone through in her vibrant artwork.
meanings.sent5: The ethylenic nature of the fruit made it stand out among the others.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or derived from ethylene.
meanings.sent1: The ethylenic substance was used in the production of synthetic fibers.
meanings.sent2: The ethylenic properties of the chemical made it ideal for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The ethylenic aroma filled the room with a sweet scent.
meanings.sent4: His ethylenic ideas sparked a revolution in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The ethylenic origin of the product was evident in its composition.
